data.title: Kamal Hassan
data.text:
Born: 7-Nov-1954

Birthplace: Paramakudi, Tamil Nadu, India

Gender: Male

Religion: Hindu

Race or Ethnicity: Asian/Indian

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: India

Executive summary: Tamil superstar

Father: D. Srinivasan

Mother: Rajalakshmi

Brother: Charuhasan (actor, b. 1930)

Brother: Chandrahasan

Sister: Nalini Raghu

Wife: Vani Ganpati (m. 1978, div. 1988)

Wife: Sarika (m. 1988, div. 2002, two daughters)

Daughter: Shruti K. Haasan (actress, b. 28-Jan-1986)

Daughter: Akshara (b. 1991)

FILMOGRAPHY AS DIRECTOR

Vishwaroopam (25-Jan-2013)

Virumandi (14-Jan-2004)

Hey Ram (18-Feb-2000)

Chachi 420 (19-Dec-1997)
